feed.title: Immich Android TV Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV: 2.6.1
New release for Immich Android TV:
entry.content:
• Add support for new Immich server API changes (1.133) for loading assets from an Album
  • Fix control issues while playing video. Include a mute button in the controls and next/previous buttons
  • Lot of under the hood optimizations
  • Add toggle to load the selected item into the background

entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV: 3.1.0
entry.content: Change hostname to server url for clarity Fix folders not showing assets if not the final subfolder

entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV:
entry.content: Fix not being able to fast forward in videos

entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV: 3.6.1
entry.content:
3.6.1 Fix videos stopping the slideshow when interacting with the controls

3.6.0 Add font size and padding options to the metadata shown in viewer/screensaver

3.5.0 Metadata customizer, you can now move metadata to the left/right and change the order. Font size and padding are coming up. Fix issue highlighted icon not being visible in the videoplayer in screensaver. Do not auto show the controller when playing videos. Select down button to bring it up.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/giejay/Immich-Android-TV/compare/3.1.1...3.6.1
